sentences.sContent: ...the dreams of democracy that have so tantalized them.
sentences.sCn: …让他们可望而不可及的民主梦想。

remMethod.val: 来自希腊神话人物Tantalus(坦塔洛斯)， 他因泄露天机而被罚立在近下巴深的水中， 口渴欲饮时水即流失； 头上有果树， 腹饥欲食时果子即消失

words.tran: 撩人的；逗引性的；干着急的

trans.tranOther: If someone or something tantalizes you, they make you feel hopeful and excited about getting what you want, usually before disappointing you by not letting you have what they appeared to offer
